title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When trying to click on the first Combo, it doesn't take focus as expected. The issue is observed in Photon version of the software. If the combo list is dropped down, it will take focus correctly.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not set the focus to it.
EB: Clicking on the first Combo should set the focus to it as expected.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog. 2. Press the "Tab" key and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo "Repository Path:" correctly.
